name: UltraStripe Notebook-Holding Messenger
description:
A lovely messenger-style bag with a shorter strap, this one will hold all your notebooks for class, and the keys to your car safe and secure all at once.

The front and bottom of this bag are made of aqua ultrasuede, while the main body of the bag and main flap are woven cotton upholstery stripe in grayed jade, emerald and linen colors. The strap is made of a vintage maroon suede belt. The closures on the corners of the bag are made out of the closure of the belt. They're  brass ball posts that hold the flap of the bag closed with tension. They're quite secure.

The bag's dimensions are 12" wide, 8.25" tall, and 2.5" deep. It has a 27" strap, making the bag 24" tall including the strap.

name: Pink and Purple Pleated Shoulder Bag with Rosette Handle
description:
This pretty little shoulder bag is made from a faux bois patterned upholstery silk in a lovely deep purple. The strap is made of a vintage Obijime in a dusty mauve color. The obijime is uncut, and the rosette on the front is made of the extra length.

In the photos, the tassels on the end on the obijime still have their protective wrapping. This is to prevent the tassels from getting knotted or damaged before you receive the bag.

This bag is unlined. All edges have been treated to prevent fraying. This bag closes with a small magnetic snap at the center of the top band.

 I DO NOT reccommend washing this bag. If it gets dirty or a spot on it, spot cleaning is ok, but DO NOT toss this bag in the washer/dryer, and please do not have it dry cleaned.

measures ::
The bag itself is 12" at the base, 8" at the opening, and 8" tall.
The strap is 36" long, making it hang at the hip, when on one shoulder. Thinner ladies could also wear this as a cross-body bag, making it hang right about waist level. It is not adjustable.

This is a completely One of a Kind bag; there will never be another.
This bag is shipped well-padded in a flat-rate priority mail envelope.

name: Vintage Obi-Made Cream and Gold Mail Pouch Trimmed Glasses Case
description:
This eyeglasses case was made from a remnant of a beautiful cream obi shot through with gold threads.
The trim is a vintage bias tape, reminiscent of the striping on old post office envelopes.
The case is lined with felt, so the obi fabric won't scratch your lenses.
There's a clear snap to close the case, hidden under a brass peacock that is topped with a small piece of strawberry quartz, for a little glitz.

Since this case was made from a vintage stiffened obi, it does not fold well. It will crease and will not uncrease, no matter how much steam is used. As such, I DO NOT reccommend washing this case. If it gets dirty or a spot on it, spot cleaning is ok, but DO NOT toss this case in the washer/dryer, and please do not have it dry cleaned.

measures ::
7 1/8" x 3" x 1/4" thick when empty
it will fit 1 standard pair of glasses/sunglasses

This is a completely One of a Kind case; there will never be another.
This case is shipped well-padded in a flat-rate priority mail envelope.

name: Vintage Obi-Made Cream and Gold Embroidered Shoulder Bag
description:
This bag was made out of a vintage Nagoya Obi.
The body is cream, shot through with gold threading, with a touch of orange piping along the sides for interest.
The flap is decorated with sashiko embroidery, and is made of the decorated part of the te (main part) of the obi.
The straps are decorated with creamy-gold upholstery trim in the same hue as the main body of the bag.
The lining is royal purple vintage satin, and the 2 inside pockets are made from more of the vintage obi.

Since this bag was made from a vintage stiffened obi, it does not fold well. It will crease and will not uncrease, no matter how much steam is used. As such, I DO NOT reccommend washing this bag. If it gets dirty or a spot on it, spot cleaning is ok, but DO NOT toss this bag in the washer/dryer, and please do not have it dry cleaned.

measures ::
13x8 to top of flap.
13x22 to top of straps.

This is a completely One of a Kind bag; there will never be another.
This bag is shipped well-padded in a large flat-rate priority mail box.
